title: BRIEF-Merrimack Provides Business Update And Reports 2017 Financial Results
text: March 12, 2018 / 10:45 AM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Merrimack Provides Business Update And Reports 2017 Financial Results Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Merrimack Pharmaceuticals Inc: * MERRIMACK PROVIDES BUSINESS UPDATE AND REPORTS 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * ‍EXPECTS THREE CLINICAL READOUTS IN 2018, INCLUDING DATA FROM TWO RANDOMIZED PHASE 2 STUDIES​ * ‍ANNOUNCED FORMATION OF A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVISORY BOARD WITH EXPERTISE IN PRECISION ONCOLOGY​ * MERRIMACK PHARMACEUTICALS -‍ CLOSURE OF 2017 WITH $93.4 MILLION IN CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS, EXTINGUISHMENT OF $60.8 MILLION OF CONVERTIBLE DEBT IN Q4​ * MERRIMACK PHARMACEUTICALS - CONTINUES TO BELIEVE THAT CASH & CASH EQUIVALENTS AS OF DEC 31, 2017 WILL BE SUFFICIENT TO FUND PLANNED OPERATIONS INTO H2 2019 * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.89 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
